info.title: My API
info.description: API documentation for my Laravel application

get.description: Retrieve flights with optional filters, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: flight_status
parameters.description: Filter by flight status (scheduled, active, landed, cancelled, incident, diverted)

parameters.name: dep_iata
parameters.description: Filter by departure airport IATA code

parameters.name: arr_iata
parameters.description: Filter by arrival airport IATA code

parameters.name: dep_icao
parameters.description: Filter by departure airport ICAO code

parameters.name: arr_icao
parameters.description: Filter by arrival airport ICAO code

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Field to sort the results by

get.description: Retrieve flight routes based on various filters such as flight number, departure/arrival airport codes, and airline codes.

parameters.name: dep_iata
parameters.description: Filter by departure airport IATA code.

parameters.name: arr_iata
parameters.description: Filter by arrival airport IATA code.

parameters.name: dep_icao
parameters.description: Filter by departure airport ICAO code.

parameters.name: arr_icao
parameters.description: Filter by arrival airport ICAO code.

get.description: Retrieve a list of airports with optional search functionality.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to get autocomplete suggestions for airports

get.description: Retrieve a list of airlines with optional search functionality.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to get autocomplete suggestions for airlines

get.description: Retrieve a list of airplanes with optional search functionality.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to get autocomplete suggestions for airplanes

get.summary: Get a list of aircraft types
get.description: Retrieve a list of aircraft types with optional search functionality.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to get autocomplete suggestions for aircraft types

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of cities. Supports search for autocomplete suggestions.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search for a city by name or IATA code

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of countries. Supports search for autocomplete suggestions.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search for a country by name, ISO2, or ISO3 code

get.description: Retrieve flight schedules with optional filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: iataCode
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airport (e.g., JFK, DXB).

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Flight status (e.g., landed, scheduled, cancelled, active, etc.).

parameters.name: airline_name
parameters.description: Airline name (e.g., Air France, Delta Air Lines).

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language for translations (e.g., en, fr, de, etc.).

get.summary: Retrieve future flight schedules based on various filters
get.description: Fetch flight schedules based on airport IATA code, schedule type, date, and optional airline IATA/ICAO codes or flight number.

parameters.name: iataCode
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airport.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The flight date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

200.description: A paginated list of future flight schedules.

get.description: Display a listing of the orders.

parameters.name: order_date
parameters.description: Filter orders by order date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

parameters.name: arrival_date
parameters.description: Filter orders by arrival date (YYYY-MM-DD format)

get.description: Show a specific order by id.
Retrieve a list of transfers, with optional filtering by driver_id, status, flight_num, and sorting by id, status, pickup, and unload.

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: Field to sort by (e.g., id, status, pickup, unload)

post.description: Create a new transfer record with the provided data.

get.description: Retrieve a specific transfer by its ID.

put.description: Update the specified transfer by its ID.

delete.description: Delete the specified transfer by its ID.

get.summary: Retrieve future flight schedules based on various filters
get.description: Fetch flight schedules based on airport IATA code, schedule type, date, and optional airline IATA/ICAO codes or flight number.

parameters.name: iataCode
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airport.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The flight date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

200.description: A paginated list of future flight schedules.

people_qty.description: Number of people in the order

flight_num.description: Flight number associated with the order

phone.description: Phone number of the person who placed the order

email.description: Email address of the person who placed the order

luggage_qty.description: Quantity of luggage for the order

comment.example: Please arrange for a VIP transfer.

driver_id.description: ID of the driver associated with the transfer

people_qty.description: Number of people in the transfer

gate.description: Gate number at the pickup location
